styles.name: --container--font-size
styles.docs:
Font size of labels inside the switch
Default: 2em

styles.name: --container--font-weight
styles.docs:
Font weight of labels inside the switch
Default: bold

styles.name: --switch--background
styles.docs:
Background color of switch when in initial condition
Default: rgba(128, 128, 128, 1)

styles.name: --switch--background-change
styles.docs:
Background color of switch when change from initial condition
Default: #3F51B5

styles.name: --switch_after--background
styles.docs:
Background of button switch
Default: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1)

styles.name: --switch_after--border-radius
styles.docs:
Border radius of button switch
Default: 50%

styles.name: --switch_after--left
styles.docs:
Distance from left of icon switch
Default: 0.313em

styles.name: --switch_after--top
styles.docs:
Distance from top of button switch
Default: 0.22em

styles.name: --switch_after--transition
styles.docs:
Transition options about the changement of button switch
Default: 0.3s
